page.title: 15The National Sports.
page.content:
There is one particular game I like best that is{cricket.}We play it like this. About twenty people can play this game. One person uses a piece of wood with a handle on it. It is called a bat. A man stands near three stumps, another man throws the ball over his head. The{batsman}tries to stop the ball from hitting the stumps. The rest of the men space out. They are called {fielders,}they catch the ball. If the {batsman}hits the ball into the {fielders}hands he is out and that is how you play{cricket.
This is another good game, it is called{football.}It is a game where twenty-two people can play on a pitch and a man stands under the net and they have to get the ball in the net to score a goal. That is how you play football.
